practice_phrases.known: It's more important
It's more important now
It's more important for you
It's more important to learn
It's more important to work together
It's more important because you can learn
practice_phrases.target: Es más importante porque puedes aprender

practice_phrases.known: It's more important to understand each other clearly
It's more important to speak with someone every day
practice_phrases.target: Es más importante hablar con alguien todos los días

practice_phrases.known: It's more important to practice than to wait
practice_phrases.target: Es más importante practicar que esperar

practice_phrases.known: It's more important to communicate well than to rush
practice_phrases.target: Es más importante comunicarse bien que apresurarse

practice_phrases.known: more important to talk
more important to talk often
more important to talk clearly
It's more important to talk
It's more important to talk often now
practice_phrases.target: Es más importante hablar frecuentemente ahora

practice_phrases.known: It's more important to talk often with others
practice_phrases.target: Es más importante hablar frecuentemente con otros

practice_phrases.known: It's more important to talk often because you can learn
practice_phrases.target: Es más importante hablar frecuentemente porque puedes aprender

practice_phrases.known: It's more important to talk often than to study alone
practice_phrases.target: Es más importante hablar frecuentemente que estudiar solo

practice_phrases.known: It's more important to talk often with someone who understands you
practice_phrases.target: Es más importante hablar frecuentemente con alguien que te entiende

practice_phrases.known: It's more important to talk often and practice every day
practice_phrases.target: Es más importante hablar frecuentemente y practicar todos los días

practice_phrases.known: to talk often
to talk often together
You need to talk
You need to talk often
I want to talk often
We should talk often with each other
It's good to talk often because you can improve
practice_phrases.target: Es bueno hablar frecuentemente porque puedes mejorar

practice_phrases.known: I prefer to talk often with someone who listens well
practice_phrases.target: Prefiero hablar frecuentemente con alguien que escucha bien

practice_phrases.known: They want to talk often to practice the language
practice_phrases.target: Quieren hablar frecuentemente para practicar el idioma

practice_phrases.known: You should try to talk often every day with your friends
practice_phrases.target: Deberías intentar hablar frecuentemente todos los días con tus amigos

practice_phrases.known: to talk
to talk now
I want to talk
You need to talk
We should talk together
It's important to talk with someone
I prefer to talk because I can learn more
practice_phrases.target: Prefiero hablar porque puedo aprender más

practice_phrases.known: You should talk with your friends every day to practice
practice_phrases.target: Deberías hablar con tus amigos todos los días para practicar

practice_phrases.known: They want to talk with someone who can help them
practice_phrases.target: Quieren hablar con alguien que pueda ayudarles

practice_phrases.known: It's better to talk clearly and slowly when you're learning something new
practice_phrases.target: Es mejor hablar claramente y despacio cuando estás aprendiendo algo nuevo

practice_phrases.known: often
very often
I practice often
We meet often
They talk together often
I visit my friends often now
practice_phrases.target: Visito a mis amigos frecuentemente ahora

practice_phrases.known: We need to practice often because it helps us learn
practice_phrases.target: Necesitamos practicar frecuentemente porque nos ayuda a aprender

practice_phrases.known: You should study the language often to remember it better
practice_phrases.target: Deberías estudiar el idioma frecuentemente para recordarlo mejor

practice_phrases.known: They communicate with each other often to stay connected and share ideas
practice_phrases.target: Se comunican entre ellos frecuentemente para mantenerse conectados y compartir ideas

practice_phrases.known: I try to speak with native speakers often because it's the best way to improve
practice_phrases.target: Intento hablar con hablantes nativos frecuentemente porque es la mejor manera de mejorar

practice_phrases.known: than to be perfect
better than to be perfect
more important than to be perfect
It's better than to be perfect
Trying is better than to be perfect
practice_phrases.target: Intentar es mejor que ser perfecto

practice_phrases.known: Learning is more important than to be perfect
practice_phrases.target: Aprender es más importante que ser perfecto

practice_phrases.known: It's better to practice every day than to be perfect immediately
practice_phrases.target: Es mejor practicar todos los días que ser perfecto inmediatamente

practice_phrases.known: Making progress is more valuable than to be perfect from the beginning
practice_phrases.target: Progresar es más valioso que ser perfecto desde el principio

practice_phrases.known: I think it's more important to communicate clearly than to be perfect with grammar
practice_phrases.target: Creo que es más importante comunicarse claramente que ser perfecto con la gramática

practice_phrases.known: You should focus on understanding and being understood rather than to be perfect all the time
practice_phrases.target: Deberías enfocarte en entender y ser entendido en lugar de ser perfecto todo el tiempo

practice_phrases.known: to be perfect
trying to be perfect
I want to be perfect
You don't need to be perfect
Nobody can be perfect always
It's impossible to be perfect all the time
practice_phrases.target: Es imposible ser perfecto todo el tiempo

practice_phrases.known: You shouldn't worry about trying to be perfect when you're learning
practice_phrases.target: No deberías preocuparte por intentar ser perfecto cuando estás aprendiendo

practice_phrases.known: Many students want to be perfect but it's better to focus on progress
practice_phrases.target: Muchos estudiantes quieren ser perfecto pero es mejor enfocarse en el progreso

practice_phrases.known: I used to think I needed to be perfect but now I understand that practice is more important
practice_phrases.target: Solía pensar que necesitaba ser perfecto pero ahora entiendo que la práctica es más importante

practice_phrases.known: The goal is not to be perfect immediately but to improve gradually and communicate effectively with others
practice_phrases.target: El objetivo no es ser perfecto inmediatamente sino mejorar gradualmente y comunicarse efectivamente con otros

practice_phrases.known: It's more important to talk often than to be perfect.
practice_phrases.target: Es más importante hablar frecuentemente que ser perfecto.
